channel.title: CVE Feed for CA Technologies, A Broadcom Company -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CA Technologies, A Broadcom Company -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-7394|2024-08-04T20:46:46.265Z -- ca%20technologies%2C%20a%20broadcom%20company -- ca%20strong%20authentication
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability in the administrative user interface of CA Technologies CA Strong Authentication 9.0.x, 8.2.x, 8.1.x, 8.0.x, 7.1.x and CA Risk Authentication 9.0.x, 8.2.x, 8.1.x, 8.0.x, 3.1.x allows an authenticated attacker to gain additional privileges in some cases where an account has customized and limited privileges.

item.title: CVE-2019-7393|2024-08-04T20:46:46.208Z -- ca%20technologies%2C%20a%20broadcom%20company -- ca%20strong%20authentication
item.description: A UI redress vulnerability in the administrative user interface of CA Technologies CA Strong Authentication 9.0.x, 8.2.x, 8.1.x, 8.0.x, 7.1.x and CA Risk Authentication 9.0.x, 8.2.x, 8.1.x, 8.0.x, 3.1.x may allow a remote attacker to gain sensitive information in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2020-29478|2024-08-04T16:55:09.794Z -- ca%20technologies%2C%20a%20broadcom%20company -- ca%20service%20catalog
item.description: CA Service Catalog 17.2 and 17.3 contain a vulnerability in the default configuration of the Setup Utility that may allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service condition.
